author: Mark Rutledge
comment: Frequently crashes on Android Lollipop. Also, when I flag a sound effect that I want to save as a favorite (I'm assuming that's the intended purpose of the flag is) it doesn't save when the app is closed.
title: Needs work!

author: Ian pinch
comment: Alright this is pretty cool and has some of the sound effects I wanted some of the dog noises and some wolf howls. I have flagged the sounds I want this would be better if you could add a section that just has your flagged sounds also either a one word description of the sounds or the ability to add a description of the sounds.
title: Almost what I want

author: Farrukh Iftikhar
comment: Works fine via my LG Watch R, crashes on my S6. I can select one sound group, when I come out and select another it crashes every time. Could definitely do with improving the different groups and also have a new group for favourites. Update: with G Watch R update, it force closes every time. Won't even load on the watch now! Total rip off that they haven't fixed any bugs amd it's actually gotten worse.
title: Crashes on phone and now watch too!!

author: Robert Kernahan
comment: It works fine on an LG R. However the app constantly asks me to review privacy settings. Very annoying.
title: Works ok, however....

author: Vinit Patel
comment: App crashes with note 3, didn't even try my moto 360
title: Note 3 crashes

author: Bradley Smith
comment: Never had a problem remote controlling this app from my watch, don't even need to open the app on the phone first. Using a g watch r and a nexus 5 as well as a nexus 6p.

author: Steve Marsh
comment: Keeps requesting antics. Needs volume, media volume is down, it would be nice to check the volume on the watch.
title: Slow

author: John Ackerley
comment: It works on the phone but can not use moto 360 to act as a remote.
title: Doesn't work

author: Steve Brightman
comment: Doesn't work. Volume is so low on max setting that you can't hear anything. So silly.
title: Volume broken

author: Ken Botticelli
comment: Select from your watch play on your phone.
title: Remote Sound Effects Pro

author: Kim Stone
comment: Will give 5 stars when I can tell what I'm playing from watch. Also would be nice if favorites carried over to watch.
title: Love the app

author: J
comment: Very cool but does crash on phone sometimes

author: Jitin Makker
comment: Didn't even open
title: Doesn't open on moto 360

author: Massimo DiSabato
comment: Crashes constantly

author: Alexander Ypema
comment: Fun gimmick that works. The interface is a little limited (e.g sounds aren't labeled except by category), and you can't use your own sounds. Also Sometimes I have to get the phone from my pocket and start the app myself before it works. That said,  it's unique in what it does in the play store right now, and it's a fun gimmick that everyone with a smartwatch should have.
title: Does as described, but a little bit limited

author: Dawn Lps
comment: The app opens and then there's nothing.  Just a white screen
title: Nothing

author: Ali al-moairak
comment: I'll give 5 star if every sound have name
title: Great app

author: Deolan pather
comment: Very good activating this from a smartwatch.definitely needs more drama type sounds...like the ' badum  tssh' more things like a drumroll etc...most important feature missing is after you flag to favorite your sound you still have to remember where those sounds are and go looking for them.after flagging them they should go into another favourites menu for quick access...vital for using the sounds without missing the moments
title: Awesome :)

author: OMAR KASSEM
comment: I want my money back or give me a solution
title: Doesnt work on my Samsung note 4

author: Benjamin Lane
comment: Best app on my moto 360 I use an external Bluetooth speaker in my office and have people looking for cats! All controlled through my watch. Only wish is a way to add my own recording as well. Truly the best wear app.
title: Needs more stars!

author: Seamus Dunne
comment: Not sure if i can get money back even if it is a small amount but the facts are i paid for this app and it doesn't work whatsoever, ridiculous
title: Doesn't work-paid for nothing

author: Pol Santos
comment: Good app. Would be great if there was an option to set favorites and maybe label the different sounds.
title: Works on LG G Watch R

author: lvldarwin
comment: Does not work on the Nexus 7
title: Remote effects

author: Stuart Davis
comment: No bad. Bit of fun. Not convinced by the benefit of marking favourites. There should be a special favourite list.
title: Not bad

author: Rodnee Powell
comment: Works well. Very responsive. Could use more sounds and the option to add your own sounds. Naming the sounds would be helpful too.
title: Great idea

author: Patricia E Prado
comment: Bad, good for nothing

author: Clayton Johnson
comment: Doesn't work. Don't waste your money or time.
title: Note 3/Moto 360

author: Bill Goodwyn
comment: Make it work on Watch Gear, eh
title: Canadian.

author: Cristian Hernandez
comment: Amazing

author: Gabrielle Austria
comment: Not bad. I would give 5 stars if it has a name and a little bit limited. I think I'm the last person who bought it, I hope you improve this. By the way, thanks for the app
title: Very Entertaining

author: Alex Gavenus
comment: Didn't even test android wear functionality because the app crashes frequently.
title: Constant crashes
